Name: Dan Pantry
AboutMe:
I'm a full-stack JavaScript developer based in the UK. I am also the owner of lambdaexpression. I'm looking to branch into contracting work. You can find my experiments and the graveyard of projects at my github. You can contact me via my email.

Here's a non-exhaustive list of the technologies I have bitten my teeth into over the past 3 - 4 years.

  • AngularJS
  • React
  • Node
  • Cloud-based computing.

I've been playing a lot with Vagrant and Bash recently. Dipping my toes in the whole virtual machine whatsit which is pretty interesting and useful when working from multiple machines.

I also have a few non-javascript related capabilities. Again, non-exhaustive.

  • C#
  • Lua
  • Ruby
  • C++

My opinions are my own and are not representative of my employers.

I'm #SOReadyToHelp.
